title: Google\Cloud\SecurityCenter\V1\ListSourcesRequest
name: ListSourcesRequest
description:
Request message for listing sources.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.securitycenter.v1.ListSourcesRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.parent
params.description: Required. Resource name of the parent of sources to list. Its format should be "organizations/[organization_id], folders/[folder_id], or projects/[project_id]".

params.name: data.page_token
params.description: The value returned by the last ListSourcesResponse; indicates that this is a continuation of a prior ListSources call, and that the system should return the next page of data.

params.name: data.page_size
params.description: The maximum number of results to return in a single response. Default is 10, minimum is 1, maximum is 1000.
